49 (extended) | duration = | event = | characters = | previous = [[The Host of the Eldar]] | next = [[Old Entish (scene)|Old Entish]] }} '''The Battle of the Hornburg''' is the thirty-eighth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' and the forty-ninth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition. [[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers scenes|49]]
